title: The Insanity Machine
description: The Insanity Machine is an introspective look at life with paranoid schizophrenia. Authored by Kenna McKinnon with contributor Austin Mardon, PhD, CM, this book takes a clinical and observational look at the challenges presented by paranoid schizophrenia. Kenna discusses the definition of paranoid schizophrenia, treatments, living with the disorder, and many other topics surrounding schizophrenia.
author: Kenna McKinnon
